=== Current Issues (Gutsy) ===

Suspend/Resume doesn't work with the opensource driver <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+bug/32315|32315]]</nowiki>
and with the proprietary fglrx <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+bug/121653|Bug: 121563]]</nowiki>
